cause.description:
This noble and worthy cause has been brought in place to stem the tide of this hideous hydra called rap music- Through our actions Rock music will again rule this planet! chant with us- rap is crap! rap is crap!
1. All Rap music must die
2. There is only Rock Music
3. Pop music falls under rap music seeing as it is crap also
cause.mission: Eradicate all rap music from the face of the planet
cause.name: The anti Rap Coalition
